item.title: 绩效食品集团与美国食品公司结束合并谈判
item.description: Performance Food Group 公司和 US Foods 公司周一表示，将不再寻求潜在的合并。【原文：Performance Food Group Company and US Foods will no longer pursue a potential merger, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 金融服务公司 SWB 将以 81 亿美元的 SPAC 交易在纽交所上市
item.description: 特殊目的收购公司 SWB 周一表示，将通过与 Soulpower Acquisition Corp 合并，以 81 亿美元的交易价格在美国上市。【原文：Financial services firm SWB will go public in the U.S. through a merger with Soulpower Acquisition Corp in a $8.1 billion deal, the special purpose acquisition company said on Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，税务和海关警察突袭了亚马逊在意大利的两个站点，调查中国走私案
item.description: 三位直接了解此事的消息人士称，意大利警方周一对亚马逊在意大利的两个站点进行了搜查和扣押，这是对涉嫌走私中国商品的调查的一部分。【原文：Italian police carried out searches and seizures at two Amazon sites in Italy on Monday as part of an investigation into the alleged smuggling of Chinese goods, three sources with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 早间竞价美联储会出手相救吗？
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 独家报道美国参议员呼吁调查 Facebook 和 Instagram 上的诈骗广告
item.description: 美国参议员乔希-霍利（Josh Hawley）和理查德-布卢门撒尔（Richard Blumenthal）要求联邦贸易委员会和证券交易委员会的负责人对 Meta Platforms 进行调查，此前路透社曾报道过这家社交媒体巨头从 Facebook 和 Instagram 上的广告中获得收入，而这些广告都是宣传诈骗和违禁商品的。【原文：U.S. senators Josh Hawley and Richard Blumenthal have asked the heads of the Federal Trade Commission and the Securities and Exchange Commission to probe Meta Platforms, following a Reuters report about the social media giant's revenue from ads on Facebook and Instagram that promote scams and banned goods.】

item.title: 投资者考虑美联储降息，关注数据，华尔街期货涨跌不一
item.description: 周一，美国股指期货在波澜不惊的交易中涨跌不一，因为投资者在权衡美联储即将降息的可能性，并搜寻数据以更清晰地了解央行的货币政策轨迹。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were mixed in choppy trading on Monday, as investors weighed the likelihood of an imminent interest rate cut by the Federal Reserve and scoured for data to get more clarity on the central bank's monetary policy trajectory.】

item.title: 经济学家认为 2026 年美国经济增长将略有加快，通胀将呈胶着状态
item.description: 接受全美商业经济协会调查的经济学家在该协会的年终预测调查中表示，明年美国经济增长将略有提高，但就业增长仍将疲软，美联储进一步降息的步伐也将放缓。【原文：U.S. economic growth will increase slightly next year but employment gains will remain sluggish and the Federal Reserve will slow any further rate cuts, economists polled by the National Association for Business Economics said in the group's year-end forecast survey.】

item.title: DoubleLine警惕人工智能融资潮可能改变美国高等级债务市场
item.description: 大型科技公司纷纷出售债券，为人工智能的扩张提供资金，这为 9 万亿美元的美国企业债券市场带来了一场高风险的赌注，促使 DoubleLine 等知名投资者对该行业不断增长的债务负担持谨慎态度。【原文：A rush of bond sales by major tech firms to fund artificial intelligence expansion is creating a high-stakes bet for the $9 trillion U.S. corporate bond market, prompting caution from prominent investors like DoubleLine over the sector's growing debt load.】

item.title: 关税迷雾散去，企业淡化涨价言论
item.description: 根据路透社查阅的公司声明和财报电话会议，第三季度表示要涨价的全球公司较少，这表明随着美国贸易协议促进了更清晰的财务规划，以及公司寻求限制失去销售额的风险，公司的策略发生了变化。【原文：Fewer global companies signaled price hikes in the third quarter, pointing to a change in tack as U.S. trade deals facilitate clearer financial planning and firms seek to limit risks of losing sales, according to company statements and earnings calls reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国 "黑色星期五 "人潮创纪录，高价之下特价商品减少
item.description: 预计将有空前数量的美国人在这个黑色星期五逛商店，但他们很可能会减少消费，因为他们发现受关税影响的零售商的特价商品较少。【原文：Unprecedented numbers of Americans are expected to hit stores this Black Friday, but they are likely to curtail their spending as they find fewer bargains from tariff-hit retailers.】

item.title: 欧盟无条件批准宏盟收购 IPG
item.description: 欧盟委员会周一表示，已无条件批准宏盟集团（Omnicom Group）以 132.5 亿美元全股票收购竞争对手英特公共集团（Interpublic Group .【原文：The EU Commission on Monday said it had unconditionally approved Omnicom Group's $13.25 billion all-stock deal to buy rival Interpublic Group .】

item.title: 消息人士称，Uber 寻求土耳其支持，从穆巴达拉手中收购 Getir Food
item.description: 两位消息人士告诉路透社，优步（Uber）已就从阿联酋控股股东穆巴达拉（Mubadala）手中收购土耳其外卖公司 Getir 食品业务的交易关键要素达成协议，他们已寻求土耳其当局的批准。【原文：Uber has reached agreement on key elements of a deal to acquire Turkish delivery company Getir's food business from Emirati controlling shareholder Mubadala, and they have sought approval from Turkish authorities, two sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 矿山中断加剧供应短缺，瑞银上调铜业展望
item.description: 瑞银周五在一份报告中称，由于矿山开采持续中断导致供应趋紧，以及电气化和清洁能源投资带来的强劲长期需求，该行预计铜价将在明年继续上涨。【原文：UBS expects copper prices to rise into next year, citing tightening supply from persistent mine disruptions and strong long-term demand from electrification and clean-energy investment, the bank said in a note on Friday.】

item.title: 参议员希望特朗普回答有关 TikTok 资产剥离计划的问题
item.description: 一位民主党参议员周一要求美国总统唐纳德-特朗普回答有关 TikTok 中国所有者计划出售该短视频应用美国资产多数股权的关键细节。【原文：A Democratic senator on Monday asked U.S. President Donald Trump to answer key details about a plan by TikTok's Chinese owners to sell a majority stake in the short video app's U.S. assets.】

item.title: 印尼国有基金主管称，该基金关注海外人工智能基础设施机遇
item.description: 印尼最大的机构投资者之一、国有企业BPJS Ketenagakerjaan的一位董事告诉路透社记者，如果获得政府批准进行海外投资，该公司将热衷于投资为人工智能产业提供基础设施的公司。【原文：State-owned BPJS Ketenagakerjaan, one of Indonesia's largest institutional investors, is keen to invest in firms that provide infrastructure for the artificial intelligence industry if it gets government approval to invest overseas, a director told Reuters.】

item.title: 欧洲央行警告：稳定币可能会抽走欧元区银行存款
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周一警告说，稳定币可能会吸引欧元区银行宝贵的零售存款，任何挤兑都可能对全球金融体系的稳定性产生广泛影响。【原文：Stablecoins could draw valuable retail deposits away from euro zone banks and any run on a coin could have widespread stability implications for the global financial system, the European Central Bank warned on Monday.】

item.title: 新加坡法院批准就渣打银行涉嫌在 1MDB 欺诈案中扮演的角色提起 27 亿美元诉讼
item.description: 寻求追回资金的清算人周一表示，新加坡法院已为针对渣打银行（STANB.UL）的 27 亿美元诉讼扫清了障碍，该诉讼指控渣打银行在 1MDB 欺诈案中扮演了重要角色。【原文：A Singapore court has cleared the way for a $2.7 billion lawsuit against Standard Chartered Bank (STANB.UL) over its alleged role in 1MDB fraud, liquidators seeking to recover the funds said on Monday.】

item.title: Revolut 二次售股后估值达 750 亿美元
item.description: 英国金融应用程序 Revolut 周一表示，它已完成二次股票发行，估值达 750 亿美元。【原文：British finance app Revolut said on Monday it had completed a secondary share offering, valuing it at $75 billion.】

item.title: 消息人士称，京东方工业集团将于下周启动首次公开募股，寻求最多 5 亿美元的投资
item.description: 三位知情人士周一透露，中国在线零售商京东商城（JD.com）旗下京东工业集团（JingDong Industrials）计划下周在香港进行首次公开募股，募集资金最多可达5亿美元。【原文：JingDong Industrials, a unit of Chinese online retailer JD.com , is planning to launch an initial public offering of up to $500 million in Hong Kong next week, three sources with knowledge of the deal said on Monday.】

item.title: 中国比特币采矿业无视 2021 年禁令，出现反弹
item.description: 矿工和行业数据显示，随着个人和企业矿工利用廉价电力和一些能源丰富省份的数据中心热潮，比特币挖矿在中国悄然卷土重来，尽管四年前就被禁止。【原文：Bitcoin mining is quietly staging a comeback in China despite being banned four years ago, as individual and corporate miners exploit cheap electricity and a data center boom in some energy-rich provinces, according to miners and industry data.】

item.title: 投资者称，必和必拓必须摆脱盎格鲁集团的影响，专注于增长项目
item.description: 投资者周一表示，必和必拓应摆脱英美资源集团，专注于其发展战略，因为澳大利亚公司在最后一刻向这家在伦敦上市的公司发出了呼吁，该公司即将与加拿大泰克资源公司（Teck Resources）达成价值 600 亿美元的合作。【原文：BHP should move on from Anglo American and focus on its growth strategy, investors said on Monday, after the Australian company's last-minute appeal to the London-listed firm that is nearing a $60 billion tie-up with Canada's Teck Resources.】

item.title: 俄罗斯顶级人工智能高管表示，新的人工智能俱乐部将赋予获胜者核动力
item.description: 俄罗斯一位顶级人工智能高管告诉路透社记者，人工智能将为那些能够引领技术发展的国家带来与核武器同等的巨大影响力，使其在 21 世纪占据优势地位。【原文：Artificial intelligence will bestow vast influence on a par with nuclear weapons to those countries who are able to lead the technology, giving them superiority in the 21st Century, one of Russia's top AI executive told Reuters.】

item.title: Prosus 半年度核心利润增长近一倍，原因是转向电子商务
item.description: 荷兰技术投资商 Prosus 周一公布，受数字服务和电子商务组合表现强劲的推动，其调整后核心利润激增 99%。【原文：Dutch technology investor Prosus on Monday reported a 99% surge in its adjusted core profit, driven by strong performances across its digital services and e-commerce portfolio.】

item.title: 威健将在 2031 年前向拉丁美洲娱乐业务投资 4.5 亿美元
item.description: 巴西天空电视台（Sky Brazil）和 DirecTV Latin America 的母公司、新成立的阿根廷怀肯公司（Waiken）周一表示，它将在 2031 年前投资 4.5 亿美元，以加强其在该地区的娱乐和电信业务。【原文：The newly formed Argentine-owned Waiken, parent company of Sky Brazil and DirecTV Latin America, said on Monday it will invest $450 million by 2031 to boost its entertainment and telecommunications business in the region.】

item.title: 从两周到两小时：人工智能如何重启英国经济
item.description: 中级会计师事务所摩尔-金斯顿-史密斯（Moore Kingston Smith）的会计师们开始使用人工智能来加快工作速度，利润率也随之跃升。【原文：When accountants at mid-tier firm Moore Kingston Smith began using artificial intelligence to speed up their work, profit margins jumped.】

item.title: 美国公司在气候谈判中坚守阵地，尽管有特朗普的存在
item.description: 尽管美国政府在 COP30 峰会召开前对全球气候议程感到失望，但美国公司并没有退缩。【原文：Despite the U.S. government souring on the global climate agenda ahead of the COP30 summit, American companies did not shy away.】

item.title: Shein 首家实体店凸显百货公司的生存之痛
item.description: Shein 进驻巴黎 BHV 旗舰店为百货公司的困境增添了政治色彩，因为购物者转向提供超快时尚的在线零售商，百货公司的生存正面临威胁。【原文：Shein's move into the flagship BHV in Paris has added political heat to the troubles of department stores, which are facing an existential threat from shoppers' shift to online retailers offering ultra-fast fashion.】

item.title: 欧盟敦促美国执行更多七月贸易协定，包括削减钢铁关税
item.description: 欧盟各国部长将于周一敦促美国高级贸易官员更多地执行 7 月份达成的欧盟-美国贸易协议，例如削减美国对欧盟钢铁征收的关税，取消对葡萄酒和烈酒等欧盟商品征收的关税。【原文：European Union ministers are set to urge top U.S. trade officials on Monday to apply more of the July EU-US trade deal, such as by cutting U.S. tariffs on EU steel and removing them for EU goods such as wine and spirits.】

item.title: 早间竞价假日周可能是日元干预的黄金时间
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 挪威财富税以百万富翁换平等
item.description: 坐在瑞士城市卢塞恩的湖畔别墅里，Borger Borgenhaug 怀念他的孙子孙女，怀念晴朗夏夜北欧大海的气息。【原文：Sitting in his lakeside villa in the Swiss city of Lucerne, Borger Borgenhaug misses his grandchildren and the smell of the Nordic sea on a clear summer night.】
